modal.updateMetadata: For better experience, it's recommended to upgrade metadata.

notifications.genericError: An error occured. Please try again.
notifications.transactionInitiatedTitle: Warming up DOTSwap just for you
notifications.transactionInitiatedNotification: You can close this modal at any time. We will notify you about transaction updates.
notifications.transactionBroadcastedTitle: Warming up DOTSwap just for you
notifications.transactionIncludedInBlockNotification: Transaction included in block. Waiting for confirmation.
notifications.transactionIsProcessingTitleBelow70: DOTSwap getting you the best deal
notifications.transactionIsProcessingTitleAbove70: Almost done... just finalizing the last things.
notifications.transactionIsProcessingNotification: Transaction is processing. You can close this window anytime.
notifications.isProcessingBelow70: Almost there! Your transaction is being processed.
notifications.isProcessingAbove70: Your transaction is almost complete. Hang tight!

infoMessage.title: Need to see all your accounts?
infoMessage.description: Head over to your wallet and customize which accounts can access DOTSwap.

pageError.minimalAmountRequirement: The minimum required amount for the {{token}} token is {{value}}.
pageError.lowLiquidity: Warning: This pool has low liquidity, there is a risk that transaction won't be completed.
pageError.tooManyDecimals: Too many {{token}} token decimals, please reduce, maximum allowed for this token is {{decimals}} decimals.
pageError.tradingMinimum: Your order trade is lower than the trading minimum.
pageError.tokenCanNotCreateWarning: Your account has reached the limit of 16 assets and liquidity pools total. Burn or send all of assets of a certain type from your account, or withdraw all assets from a pool to make room for another type. Alternatively connect another wallet and use it for new assets and pools.
pageError.lowMinimalAmountAssetToken: The selected {{tokenSymbol}} token you want to receive is below the minimal amount {{minimalAmount}}.
pageError.transactionTimeout:
It seems that the transaction is taking longer than usual.
Please check the status of the transaction in your wallet by clicking on {{url}}
pageError.maxValueLessThanMinAmount: The maximum value is less than the minimum amount.

dashboardPage.totalAssetsTooltip: Total balance is calculated based on USD price of DOT, DED, USDt, USDC, PINK.
dashboardPage.connectWallet: To see your asset list first connect your wallet.

assetItem.lockedTooltip: Locked balance, not included in your available balance.
assetItem.reservedTooltip: Reserved balance, not included in your available balance.

poolsPage.activeLiquidityPositions: Active liquidity positions will appear here.
poolsPage.connectWalletToView: Connect wallet to view your liquidity positions.
poolsPage.poolExists: No need to create a new pool. Liquidity can be added to the existing one.
poolsPage.doNotHaveLiquidityPair: You don't have tokens from this liquidity pair.
poolsPage.assetsWait: Fetching your token balances, please wait a few seconds
poolsPage.minimumAmountExceeded: Full withdrawal of this amount is not possible, as the defined minimum amount per token must stay within the pool.

swapPage.poolExists: No need to create a new pool. Liquidity can be added to the existing one.
swapPage.palletSlippageError: Calculated amount out is less than provided minimum amount.
swapPage.slippageError: The transaction could not be completed due to the set slippage.

crosschainPage.insufficientBalanceWarning: Current balance is insufficient to perform cross-chain transaction.

mobilePage.title: Coming soon to mobile! Stay tuned for updates.
mobilePage.subtitle: This experience is currently optimized for desktop browsers. For the best experience, please visit us on your computer.
mobilePage.responsiveSubtitle: This experience is optimized for desktop browsers. For the best experience, please visit us on your computer.

offlinePage.title: Whoops!
offlinePage.subtitle: No internet connection was found. Check your connection or try again.

pallet.AmountOneLessThanMinimal: Provided amount should be greater than or equal to the existential deposit/asset's minimal amount.
pallet.AmountOutTooHigh: Desired amount can't be equal to the pool reserve.
pallet.AmountTwoLessThanMinimal: Provided amount should be greater than or equal to the existential deposit/asset's minimal amount.
pallet.ProvidedMinimumNotSufficientForSwap: Calculated amount out is less than provided minimum amount.
pallet.AssetOneDepositDidNotMeetMinimum: The minimal amount requirement for the first token in the pair wasn't met.
pallet.IncorrectPoolAssetId: It was not possible to get or increment the Id of the pool.
pallet.CorrespondenceError: Unable to find an element in an array/vec that should have one-to-one correspondence with another. For example, an array of assets constituting a path should have a corresponding array of amounts along the path.
pallet.ProvidedMaximumNotSufficientForSwap: Provided maximum amount is not sufficient for swap.

platform.AmountOneLessThanMinimal: The provided amount is less than the minimum required for this asset.
platform.AmountOutTooHigh: Please consider reducing the desired amount, as the minimum amount per token must remain in the pool as a reserve.
platform.AmountTwoLessThanMinimal: Your order trade is lower than the trading minimum.
platform.ProvidedMinimumNotSufficientForSwap: The transaction could not be completed due to the set slippage.
platform.AssetOneDepositDidNotMeetMinimum: Amount provided for the first token in the pair is below the minimum required for this asset.
platform.EqualAssets: Provided assets are equal. Please choose two different assets.
platform.InsufficientLiquidity: The swap cannot be completed due to insufficient liquidity in the pool. Please try again with a lower amount.
platform.ProvidedMaximumNotSufficientForSwap: The transaction could not be completed due to the set slippage. Please increase the slippage tolerance for the transaction to proceed successfully.
